dataLink.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)

availability.description: A new set of global gridded land-use forcing datasets are being developed to link historical land-use data and future projections in a standard format required by climate models.
availability.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)

description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
name: Historical Land Use
rationale: Land cover and land use change may have an impact on the surface albedo, evapotranspiration, sources and sinks of greenhouse gases, or other properties of the climate system and may thus give rise to radiative forcing and/or other impacts on climate, locally or globally.
